article.name: Mendomic
article.description:
This flash piece is a copy of the work done by Jared Tarbel at //www.levitated.net. I saw, I copied, I created. His description of an idea was so simple, I just had to do it for my self. The results were facinating.
Watch for yourself.
article.keywords: facinating flash memdomic mendomic bevels highlights colours levitated simple mx actionscript shapes layers background animation movement
